item.description: Hike the Wildland Trust trails that border Myles Standish State Forest. This 3 hour hike will cover the Gramps Loop and Halfway Ponds trails. The hike will pass near Gallows, Long and Halfway Ponds. The hike will cover a great variety of habitat, going through pine barrons, large white pine groves, beach forests, bog and wetland areas with a great hillside views of Halfway Pond. The hike will be 3+ hours with a few moderate hills.  Bring water and snacks.  Meet at 12:45 at Plymouth South High School parking lot. We will car pool to trailhead where parking is very limited.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Plymouth South High School parking lot on Long Pond Road

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: June First Sunday hike
